name: Prime counting
description: You need to count the number of prime numbers less than or equal to some natural ```n```. For example: ``` count_primes_less_than(34) = 11 count_primes_less_than(69) = 19 count_primes_less_than(420) = 81 count_primes_less_than(666) = 121 ``` - In this kata all the tests will be with `$ 1 \leqslant n \leqslant 10^{10}$` - Code length limited to 3000 characters to avoid hardcoding. Good luck!
